sentences.sContent: He proved a superlative student of acrobatics and martial arts; he started working in films at age 8.
sentences.sContent_eng: He proved a superlative student of acrobatics and martial arts; he started working in films at age 8.
sentences.sCn: 在这里他证明自己是学杂技和武术的超级好手，他8岁开始在电影上露面。

words.tran: 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者

trans.tranOther: skilful movements of your body, for example jumping through the air or balancing on a rope
